title: Your Favorite Champion is bullshit.
body: Especially the ult. Easily one of the most broken ults in the entire game. How you can defend that poorly designed piece of garbage is a mystery to me. Why hasn't Riot reworked this champ yet? Can't they see just how unfun they are to play against? Let's be real, the only people defending this champ are a bunch of mains trying to defend their freelo.

replies.body: {{champion:77}} Wait, how does this work?

> [{quoted}](name=HayRoss,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KQW4P9O0,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-10-23T05:02:27.757+0000)
>
> {{champion:77}} Wait, how does this work?

Udyr is so broken that he doesn't even need an ultimate. A spammable stun, spammable speed boost, spammable shield, free lifesteal, free massive AS steroid, and free AOE waveclear? Someone needs to be fired.
Only Rioter who should be fired is the one who designed your favorite champion.

No fuck u mate. The man who designed YOUR favorite should be fired. That champ is some bullshit.

Note: I have no idea who the hell your main is. Just so ya know.

> [{quoted}](name=Anidan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KQW4P9O0,comment-id=0012000000000001,timestamp=2015-10-23T05:37:37.444+0000)

> Note: I have no idea who the hell your main is. Just so ya know.

Well then you're making a bold claim without pertinent and critical information (just like the OP did in his original post) which does nothing other than make you look bad.

The equation is f(x) = a ( x - h) + k

Because 0 < b < 1, the trajectory of the joke flew over your head in an over-calculation.

... See Trig teacher I do understand maths...

The equation of a parabola is f(x) = a ( x - h )**^2** + k 

I see no 'b' in that equation

And what do parabolas have anything to do with any of this

it was a joke...

That's why I made that teacher joke...

Dude you didn't understand 2 jokes in a row that were pretty obvious. Pls learn humor before bitching on an obviously trolly/joking thread.
T^A^N^G^O
Wow I got 18 likes MOM GET THE CAMERA ;-;
Lol people downvoting you and not getting that this is a joke
I mean, he's not wrong with the spamming part. qwerqwerqwerqwerqweqrqwerqweqrqweqrqwrqwrqwqwerqwer
